img_text: luke? // rhodekill! @kllmongr since some of y'all don't know how to fucking act, here's a list of terms you SHOULD NOT use to describe trans folk: -tranny -transgendered -transsexual -trap -transvestite -cross dresser -shemale -intersex thanks:) 10:03 am 30 Aug. 18 2,959 Retweets 6,660 Likes
